title: Constitution
definition: A body of fundamental principles or established precedents according to which a state or other organization is acknowledged to be governed
sentence: The genetic constitution of a species

title: Legislature
definition: A legislature is a deliberative assembly with the authority to make laws for a political entity
sentence: The Nevada state legislature passed a law to prohibit dumping of nuclear waste

title: Conspicuous
definition: Standing out so as to be clearly visible
sentence: He was very thin, with a conspicuous Adam's apple
